T02D1999:201b-1: shr'i badzra bhee ra wa s'a dha na /
T02D1999:201b-3: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs //
T02D1999:201b-4: dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1999:201b-5: rnam rtog dra ba rab bsal zhing //
T02D1999:201b-6: ye shes rgya mtsho blo mnga' ba'i //
T02D1999:201b-7: 'jam pa'i dbyangs la rab btud de //
T02D1999:201b-8: rdo rje 'jigs byed sgrub thabs bshad //
T02D1999:201b-9: dang por re zhig sngags pa yis //
T02D1999:201b-10: dur khrod dang ni chu yi 'gram //
T02D1999:201b-11: shing gcig dang ni mtshan ma gcig / lam gyi bzhi mdo ri bo'i rtse //
T02D1999:201b-12: khang stong dang ni ma mo'i gnas //
T02D1999:201b-13: lha rnams yang dag rtsod pa'i sa //
T02D1999:201b-14: grong khyer grong gi mtha' rnams dang//
T02D1999:201b-15: rang nyid rjes dga'i gnas 'dug nas //
T02D1999:201b-16: 'jam dbyangs khro bo bsgrub par bya //
T02D1999:201b-17: rang gi snying gar padma la //
T02D1999:201b-18: nyi ma la gnas yi ge mchog / thugs kyi bdag nyid rnam bsgoms te //
T02D1999:201b-19: bla ma dang bcas lha dmigs bya //
T02D1999:201b-20: ye shes las gzhan tshogs kyi phyir //
T02D1999:201b-21: phyag 'tshal mchod cing bsngo mthar thug / rnam bdun bsags nas de rjes su //
T02D1999:201b-22: tshangs pa'i gnas ni bsgom par bya //
T02D1999:201b-23: aom sva bh'a wa shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
T02D1999:201b-24: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1999:201b-25: stong pa nyid du rnam pa bsgoms nas //
T02D1999:201b-26: yam ram wam lam yi ge las //
T02D1999:201b-27: rlung dang me dang chu dang ni //
T02D1999:201b-28: dbang chen dkyil 'khor bsam par bya //
T02D1999:201b-29: der ni h'um gi rnam pa las //
T02D1999:201b-30: rdo rje'i sa gzhi ra ba dang //
T02D1999:201b-31: de bzhin rdo rje'i gur dang ni //
T02D1999:201b-32: bla re yang ni bsam par bya //
T02D1999:201b-33: de dbus gnod mdzes rgyal po ni //
T02D1999:201b-34: bka' yi 'khor lo bsgom par bya //
T02D1999:201b-35: rtsibs bcu rab 'bar cung zad ser //
T02D1999:202a-2: gnod mdzes la sogs khro bo'i tshogs //
T02D1999:202a-3: sna tshogs padma nyi zla la //
T02D1999:202a-4: g-yon brkyang zhabs kyis yang dag gnas //
T02D1999:202a-5: zhal gsum phyag drug dang po yi //
T02D1999:202a-6: phyag gnyis rang gi shes rab 'khyud //
T02D1999:202a-8: rdo rje 'bar ba'i sprin lta bus//
T02D1999:202a-9: bgegs kyi tshogs rnams rab tu 'joms //
T02D1999:202a-10: gnod mdzes dang ni gshin rje gshed //
T02D1999:202a-11: gzhan gyis mi thub rta mgrin dang //
T02D1999:202a-12: bdud rtsi 'khyil rnams dbus dang ni //
T02D1999:202a-13: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su bsam //
T02D1999:202a-14: 'dod pa dbyug pa stobs mi g-yo //
T02D1999:202a-15: byin za la sogs mtshams su'o //
T02D1999:202a-16: gtsug tor rdo rje sa 'og ni //
T02D1999:202a-17: de bzhin steng dang 'og tu bsam //
T02D1999:202a-18: dbus dang shar dang lho dang nub //
T02D1999:202a-19: de bzhin steng gi khro bo rnams //
T02D1999:202a-20: mthing dang dkar po dmar po dang //
T02D1999:202a-21: de ltar sngon po dkar dang dmar //
T02D1999:202a-22: dkar po mthing ga dmar po dang //
T02D1999:202a-23: de bzhin dmar dang mthing ga dkar //
T02D1999:202a-24: ser ljang mthing ga dkar po ni //
T02D1999:202a-25: gnod sbyin bden bral rlung gi phyogs //
T02D1999:202a-26: mdog rnams dbang po'i phyogs ltar te //
T02D1999:202a-27: de bzhin byin za dbang ldan dang //
T02D1999:202a-28: 'og rnams dbus ma ji lta bu'i //
T02D1999:202a-29: rdo rje tho ba be con dang //
T02D1999:202a-30: de bzhin padma rdo rje dang //
T02D1999:202a-31: lcags kyu dbyug pa dpal rtse dang //
T02D1999:202a-32: ral gri 'khor lo rdo rje rnams //
T02D1999:202a-33: g-yas kyi dang po'i rim bzhin du'o //
T02D1999:202a-34: de bzhin g-yon pa ral gri ste //
T02D1999:202a-35: mi g-yo ba la rdo rje'o //
T02D1999:202a-36: g-yas g-yon par ma thams cad la //
T02D1999:202a-37: rin po che dang padmas sbrel //
T02D1999:202a-38: bdag po'i g-yas g-yon tha mar ni //
T02D1999:202a-39: lcags kyu dang ni zhags pa'o //
T02D1999:202a-40: de bzhin du ni rta mgrin la //
T02D1999:202a-42: gnod mdzes la sogs thams cad la //
T02D1999:202a-43: thugs kyi bdag pos rgyas btab ste //
T02D1999:202a-44: gshin rje gshed dang rta mgrin la //
T02D1999:202a-45: de bzhin sku dang gsung gis so //
T02D1999:202a-46: de nas bdag po yongs gyur nas //
T02D1999:202a-47: rdo rje sems dpa' bsam byas te //
T02D1999:202a-48: dkar dang mthing ga dmar po'i zhal //
T02D1999:202a-49: phyag drug dang pos rig ma 'khyud ;
T02D1999:202a-50: / lhag ma rdo rje ral gri dang //
T02D1999:202a-52: de nas chos kyi 'byung gnas ni //
T02D1999:202a-53: mdog dkar gyen bsgreng gzugs can la //
T02D1999:202a-54: chu skyes sna tshogs rdo rje yis //
T02D1999:202a-55: rnam par rgyal ba mkhas pas bsgom //
T02D1999:202b-0: rtag pa'i rgyal @202b po bsam pa ni //
T02D1999:202b-2: de las byung ba'i gzhal yas khang //
T02D1999:202b-3: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1999:202b-4: rta babs bzhi yis rnam par mdzes //
T02D1999:202b-5: dril bu 'phan bcing la sogs dang //
T02D1999:202b-6: me tog phreng bas rab tu brgyan //
T02D1999:202b-7: grva rnams dang ni thams cad dang //
T02D1999:202b-8: sgo khyud dag gi gnas su yang//
T02D1999:202b-9: rdo rje rin po che yis brgyan //
T02D1999:202b-10: de bzhin zla ba phyed pas so //
T02D1999:202b-11: de yi dbus su 'khor lo ni //
T02D1999:202b-12: re'u mig dgu pa zlum po ste //
T02D1999:202b-13: sgo gcig dag ni bzhag nas ni //
T02D1999:202b-14: lhag ma'i sgo ni gcad par bya //
T02D1999:202b-15: sgo bzhi dang ni mtshams rnams su //
T02D1999:202b-16: yi dags chen po dgod par bya //
T02D1999:202b-17: de dbus dbyangs yig dang po las ;
T02D1999:202b-18: / byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam //
T02D1999:202b-19: der ni dh'i: las gyur pa yi //
T02D1999:202b-20: 'jam dpal gzhon nu bsam pa ni //
T02D1999:202b-21: gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1999:202b-22: zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis te //
T02D1999:202b-23: cung zad ser po phyag g-yas na //
T02D1999:202b-24: ral gri g-yon glegs bam bsnams //
T02D1999:202b-25: de yi thugs kar dbyangs yig ni //
T02D1999:202b-26: bcu drug pa las byung ba yi //
T02D1999:202b-27: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam bsams nas //
T02D1999:202b-28: de yi 'od kyis phyogs bcu na //
T02D1999:202b-29: bzhugs pa'i bde gshegs sras bcas dang //
T02D1999:202b-30: rig pa'i lha mo khro bo'i tshogs //
T02D1999:202b-31: spyan drangs 'jam dpal dang bcas pa //
T02D1999:202b-32: sangs rgyas tshogs kun rab bzhugs pas //
T02D1999:202b-33: 'od zer drug pos khyab pa yi //
T02D1999:202b-34: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya //
T02D1999:202b-35: de steng kha dog dkar po h'um //
T02D1999:202b-36: 'od zer lnga dang ldan pa bsam //
T02D1999:202b-37: de yi 'od kyis sangs rgyas tshogs //
T02D1999:202b-38: sngon bzhin spyan drangs rab bcug nas //
T02D1999:202b-39: rdo rje chen po rnam par bsgom //
T02D1999:202b-40: de yi 'od zer las byung ba'i //
T02D1999:202b-41: sangs rgyas sras bcas khro bo dang //
T02D1999:202b-42: rig pa'i lha mo la sogs pas //
T02D1999:202b-43: nam mkha'i khams kun khyab par bsam //
T02D1999:202b-44: 'gro kun byang chub la bkod de //
T02D1999:202b-45: de rnams dang bcas rdo rje la //
T02D1999:202b-46: bcug pas bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das //
T02D1999:202b-47: 'jigs byed sku mdog nag por bsam ;
T02D1999:202b-48: / zhal dgu phyag ni sum cu bzhi //
T02D1999:202b-49: bcu drug zhabs la g-yon brkyang ba //
T02D1999:202b-50: gcer bu mtshan ma gyen du 'greng //
T02D1999:202b-51: ljags brkyang gad mo rnam par sgrog / spyan gsum dpral ba'i khro gnyer can //
T02D1999:202b-53: thod pas brgyan zhing phem gyi sgra //
T02D1999:203a-2: gsus pa che zhing skra brdzes pa //
T02D1999:203a-3: dang po'i zhal ni ma he'i ste //
T02D1999:203a-4: kha dog nag po cung zad khro //
T02D1999:203a-5: g-yas kyi rva yi zhal gsum ni //
T02D1999:203a-6: dang po mthing ga g-yas dmar po //
T02D1999:203a-7: g-yon ser shin tu khro ba'o //
T02D1999:203a-8: de bzhin g-yon gyi rtsa ba'i zhal //
T02D1999:203a-9: dkar po dud ka de bzhin du //
T02D1999:203a-10: nag po shin tu khros pa yis //
T02D1999:203a-11: rva gnyis dbus su zhal dmar po //
T02D1999:203a-13: de steng 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i zhal //
T02D1999:203a-14: ser ba cung zad khro ba ste //
T02D1999:203a-15: zur phud lnga pa gzhon nu yi //
T02D1999:203a-16: rgyan gyis legs par rnam par brgyan //
T02D1999:203a-17: zhal rnams kun kyang spyan gsum po //
T02D1999:203a-18: g-yas g-yon dang po'i phyag gnyis kyis //
T02D1999:203a-19: glang chen pags pa rlon pa bsnams //
T02D1999:203a-20: gri gug bhindi p'a la dang //
T02D1999:203a-21: gtun shing chu gri de bzhin du //
T02D1999:203a-22: karna ya dang sta re dang //
T02D1999:203a-23: mdung dang mda' dang lcags kyu dang //
T02D1999:203a-24: dbyug pa kha tv'am 'khor lo dang //
T02D1999:203a-25: rdo rje rdo rje tho ba dang //
T02D1999:203a-26: ral gri rnge'u chung g-yas pa yi //
T02D1999:203a-27: phyag mtshan rnams ni rim bzhin bsam //
T02D1999:203a-28: de bzhin g-yon gyi phyag rnams ni //
T02D1999:203a-29: thod pa dang ni mgo bo dang //
T02D1999:203a-30: de bzhin du ni rkang pa dang //
T02D1999:203a-31: phub dang de bzhin zhags pa gzhu //
T02D1999:203a-32: rgyu ma dril bu mi'i lag pa //
T02D1999:203a-33: de bzhin dur khrod ras dang ni //
T02D1999:203a-34: rtse gsum mtshon gtsug skyes bu dang //
T02D1999:203a-35: me snod thod pa'i dum bu dang //
T02D1999:203a-36: sdigs mdzub rtse gsum pa dan dang //
T02D1999:203a-37: rlung gi ras rnams rim bzhin bsnams //
T02D1999:203a-38: mi dang ma he glang dang ni //
T02D1999:203a-39: bong bu rnga mo de bzhin khyi //
T02D1999:203a-40: thug re ce spyang g-yas pa yi //
T02D1999:203a-41: zhabs rnams kyis ni rim pas mnan ;
T02D1999:203a-42: / de bzhin g-yon pa'i zhabs rnams kyis //
T02D1999:203a-43: bya rgod 'ug pa bya rog dang //
T02D1999:203a-44: ne tso khra dang nam mkha' lding //
T02D1999:203a-45: khyim bya bzhad rnams rim bzhin mnan //
T02D1999:203a-46: de nas dbang bskur skye mched dag / byin gyis brlab cing lus la sogs /
T02D1999:203a-47: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje bsgom //
T02D1999:203a-48: de bzhin ye shes sems dpar bsam //
T02D1999:203a-49: de nas blo dang ldan pa yis //
T02D1999:203a-50: rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po ni //
T02D1999:203a-51: spyan drangs yon chab la sogs pas //
T02D1999:203a-52: rim bzhin mchod pas mnyes par bya //
T02D1999:203a-53: aom hr'i: ha bho ma h'a kro dha a'a gtstsha /
T02D1999:203a-54: aa smata p'u dza pra ti grihna tu pra s'adha /
T02D1999:203a-55: me dhi mam ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1999:203b-3: aom wi kri t'a na na dusht'am satva da ma ka ga: ga: dri'i sngags so //
T02D1999:203b-4: aom ku m'a ra r'u pi ni dza dza h'um ha /
T02D1999:203b-8: aom d'ipta lo tsa ne bi kri t'a na na
T02D1999:203b-9: ma h'a aatta ha sa na di ni d'ipt'a ya
T02D1999:203b-10: sv'a h'a / mar me'i sngags so //
T02D1999:203b-11: aom badzra nee wi d+ye a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1999:203b-13: aom k'a la r'u pa sarba satva da ma ka
T02D1999:203b-14: ma h'a bh'u ta pa ti ai dam pa lim
T02D1999:203b-15: grihna grihna pa ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1999:203b-17: de nas yang dag sngags bzlas bya //
T02D1999:203b-18: bzlas dus rang gi snying gar ni //
T02D1999:203b-19: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam bsams te //
T02D1999:203b-20: rang gi gsang sngags rnam bkod bya //
T02D1999:203b-21: de rjes ma yengs sems kyis ni //
T02D1999:203b-22: 'bar ba'i gsang sngags bzlas par bya //
T02D1999:203b-33: rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i mchog /'khor lo ma he'i zhal na ni //
T02D1999:203b-34: rtsa ba'i sngags kyis las kun byed //
T02D1999:203b-35: gsang sngags 'bum du bzlas pa yis //
T02D1999:203b-36: las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur //
T02D1999:203b-37: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um phat /
T02D1999:203b-38: 'di ni gsang sngags rgyal po ste //
T02D1999:203b-39: ma he'i zhal gyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1999:203b-40: las rnams kun ni byed pa'o //
T02D1999:203b-41: 'bum phrag gsum ni bzlas nas su //
T02D1999:203b-42: las rnams thams cad rab tu bya //
T02D1999:203b-43: aom ya m'anta ka h'um phat /
T02D1999:203b-44: 'di ni ma he'i gdong can gyi //
T02D1999:203b-45: snying po'i sngags su rab tu grags //
T02D1999:203b-46: yi ge re la 'bum bzlas na //
T02D1999:203b-47: las rnams thams cad rab tu 'grub //
T02D1999:203b-48: khams gsum la ni gang dang gang ;
T02D1999:203b-49: / shin tu mnyam gzhag rab tu grub //
T02D1999:203b-50: de nas bzlas pa btang 'dod na //
T02D1999:203b-51: spyan drangs khro bo gshegs su gsol //
T02D1999:203b-52: aom dza ya dza ya su dza ya bi shva r'u pa dha ri /
T02D1999:203b-54: kri tvam te na ta th'a gtstsha sarba buddha shtsa
T02D1999:203b-55: bi sardza ya ma ma karyam ku ru sv'a h'a
T02D1999:203b-56: / gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so //
T02D1999:203b-57: gang gzhan lhag pa'i sems med kyang //
T02D1999:203b-58: brtse ba'i stobs kyis 'di bris pa'o //
T02D1999:203b-59: bsod nams de yis 'gro ba rnams //
T02D1999:203b-60: 'jam dpal dbyangs dang mtshungs par shog / dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
